item.title: Emirates introduces new premium offerings in First and Business Class
item.description:
Emirates has introduced new luxury products for its First and Business Class passengers, partnering with brands like BYREDO, Bowers & Wilkins, and Bulgari to elevate the travel experience. ](https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgd9y3iVi6anaC1N4Cso7QmgPJovqGEwEKcXCffrreFoqNcy3Bnr-B79U45k6PqBzF2gV2uzc94przcIphwRp2ecePtOYdspt9-PjYc3KQTh976kDvFOItJfkbCCO02xL93YGyDNrANYHYE/s1600/Emirates+byredo+wellness.jpg) Source: Emirates. The BYREDO for Emirates Wellness kit. First Class passengers in Emirates’ private suites will receive a specially designed BYREDO travel wellness kit. This hypoallergenic skincare line, featuring chamomile, was created specifically for Emirates and introduced initially on the airline’s new Boeing 777 suites...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/emirates-introduces-new-premium-offerings-in-first-and-business-class/

item.title: Etihad launches exclusive city-inspired Business Class amenities
item.description:
Source: Etihad Airways. Etihad Airways has introduced new limited-edition amenity kits for their Business Class travelers. This launch is a collaboration between the airline and the luxury travel brand LUXE City Guides, a company known for its sophisticated travel guides. The kits reflect Etihad Airways’ elegant brand and include in-flight amenities and natural facial products. These products were specially created by Scaramouche + Fandango, a London-based skincare and grooming company...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/etihad-launches-exclusive-city-inspired-business-class-amenities/
